title: Debugging RAG Chatbots and AI Agents with Sessions
title1: Debugging RAG Chatbots and AI Agents with Sessions
title2: Debugging RAG Chatbots and AI Agents with Sessions
description: Debugging AI agents can be difficult, but it doesn't have to be. In this guide, we explore common AI agent pitfalls, how to debug multi-step processes using Helicone's Sessions, and the best tools for building reliable, production-ready AI agents.
author: Lina Lam
